diskUsedPercentRemediation:
Creates or updates a CloudWatch alarm for the 'disk_used_percent' metric on Linux EC2 instances.
Ensures disk usage thresholds are monitored and alerts are triggered when usage exceeds 80%.
windowsDiskUsedPercentRemediation:
Creates or updates a CloudWatch alarm for the 'disk_used_percent' metric on Windows EC2 instances.
Ensures disk space usage is monitored and alerts are triggered if thresholds are breached.
cpuUtilizationRemediation:
Creates or updates a CloudWatch alarm for the 'CPUUtilization' metric on Windows and Linux EC2 instances.
Ensures high CPU usage is detected and alerts are triggered for sustained utilization above threshold.
statusCheckRemediation:
Creates or updates a CloudWatch alarm for the 'StatusCheckFailed' metric on Windows and Linux EC2 instances.
Ensures instance and system health checks are monitored and alerted when failures occur.
memoryUtilizationRemediation:
Creates or updates a CloudWatch alarm for memory usage using CloudWatch Agent custom metrics.
Ensures alerting when memory utilization exceeds defined thresholds on EC2 instances.
ssmAgentRemediation:
Installs, starts, or reconfigures the AWS Systems Manager agent on EC2 instances.
Ensures instances are manageable via Systems Manager and that the agent is running.
detailedMonitoringRemediation:
Enables detailed monitoring on EC2 instances.
Provides 1-minute metric granularity for enhanced observability and faster alerting.
ebsOptimizedRemediation:
Modifies the EC2 instance to enable EBS-optimized mode where supported.
Improves performance and reduces latency for attached EBS volumes.
volumeInUseRemediation:
Identifies unattached EBS volumes and flags them for cleanup.
Helps prevent resource sprawl and reduce unnecessary storage costs.
logicalDiskFreeSpaceRemediation:
Configures a CloudWatch alarm using custom metrics to monitor logical disk free space on Windows EC2 instances.
Triggers alerts when available disk space falls below a defined threshold.
windowsAvailableMemoryRemediation:
Creates a CloudWatch alarm using custom metrics to track available memory in bytes on Windows EC2 instances.
Alerts are triggered when memory falls below operational thresholds.
ec2BackupPlanProtectionRemediation:
Adds EC2 instances to a Backup Plan using AWS Backup.
Ensures resources are protected by scheduled automated backup policies.
